GSD.product_version: versions from v5.14 to before v5.18.4
GSD.description:
serial: 8250_aspeed_vuart: Fix potential NULL dereference in aspeed_vuart_probe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.4 by commit d5f1275f101e0e8a172d300d897f5a12e87e3485, it was introduced in version v5.14 by commit 54da3e381c2b55289b220601f403f17df7b20597. For more details please see the references link.
